Class Utility

Utility functions to generate Pothosware.SoapySDR.Device parameters

Syntax
public class Utility

Methods

GetFormatString<T>()

Return the SoapySDR complex format string that corresponds to the given type. This string will be passed into Device's stream setup functions.

This function will throw if the type is unsupported.

Declaration
public static string GetFormatString<T>() where T : unmanaged
Returns
Type Description
string

The type's complex format string (see Pothosware.SoapySDR.StreamFormat)
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The format type

KwargsToString(IDictionary<string, string>)

Convert a key-value map to a markup string.

The markup format is: "key0=value0, key1=value1".

Declaration
public static string KwargsToString(IDictionary<string, string> kwargs)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IDictionary<string, string> kwargs

The key-value map
Returns
Type Description
string

An equivalent markup string

StringToKwargs(string)

Convert a markup string to a key-value map.

The markup format is: "key0=value0, key1=value1".
